column1: Smoque BBQ////So Mike said hold on let me see what I can do. Mike walked out 10 minutes later with a bag in hand. In the bad we're 2 brisket sandwiches and 2 bake beans along with 2 sausage. We asked Mike how much we owed. He wouldn't let us pay. We said no we insist. This went on for a minute or so.
